monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Assault Shield
skills.description: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Charged Destruction
skills.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Burn, Weakness or Armor Break to a random enemy.

skills.name: Cleansing Burn
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an ally applies Burn on an enemy or when an enemy takes Burn damage, 75% chance to remove a Buff from them.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Critical Flames
skills.description: Fire attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Heat
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Fire Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Fuel
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Burn damage, each Monster in your party gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Inferno
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Killing Dance
skills.description: Whenever this Monster knocks an enemy out, it gains 3 Charge stacks and it regains half of the Charge stacks it used up during the attack.

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Lava Rush
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Rush Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Light Instinct
skills.description: Decrease damage taken by 15%.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Quicken
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Sonic Assault
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Sonic Assault Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (neutral) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Tornado
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Removes 1 Buff from targets

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%
